name: Dosemu2
body:
### Welcome to dosemu2 home page dosemu2 is a virtual machine that allows you to run DOS programs under linux. It is an attempt to re-incarnate the famous dosemu project. ### Get source code You can get source code from git with the following command:
`git clone https://github.com/stsp/dosemu2.git`
or [browse the repository](https://github.com/stsp/dosemu2) . ### Support or Contact If you have any problem, you can [report bug](https://github.com/stsp/dosemu2/issues) or ask for help in the [mailing lists](http://www.dosemu.org/mailinglist.html) .
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
